sections.title: What agreements are contracts
sections.text: All agreements are contracts if they are made by the free consent of parties competent to contract, for a lawful consideration and with a lawful object, and are not hereby expressly declared to be void.

sections.title: Who are competent to contract
sections.text: Every person is competent to contract who is of the age of majority according to the law and is of sound mind and is not disqualified from contracting by any law.
